TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CopyFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseMoveCopyFolderType

summary.span: 类表示 Exchange 数据库中复制文件夹的操作。

span.span: The class represents an operation to copy folders in an Exchange database.

span.para: 在相同的结构中维护内容时，该 CopyFolder 操作会复制文件夹及其所有内容。复制的文件夹将具有新的文件夹标识符，并且更改键。
The CopyFolder operation copies folders and all their contents while the content is maintained in the same structure. The copied folders will have new folder identifiers and change keys.
下面的代码示例演示如何将两个文件夹复制到目标文件夹，然后获取新文件夹标识符。
The following code example shows you how to copy two folders to a destination folder and then get the new folder identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数初始化的新实例类。

span.span: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.
